alert.note: Alert for Greenville; Pickens; Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 7:11PM EDT until July 29 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Greenville County in Upstate South Carolina... Northern Spartanburg County in Upstate South Carolina... Northeastern Pickens County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 711 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Columbus to 15 miles north of Downtown Greenville to 11 miles southeast of Brevard, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Spartanburg, Greer, Mauldin, Taylors, Berea, Five Forks and Welcome. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
